definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Like Dong, Wintour thinks she is never wrong.
sentences.chinese: 与董明珠一样，温图尔认为自己从不出错。

sentences.english: She was assisted in the management of her vast property by her son-in-law Mathur Mohan.
sentences.chinese: 她被女婿马图尔巴乌任命去协助管理巨大的财富。

sentences.english: I used to escort Mathur's daughter to her husband's chamber with the maidservant.
sentences.chinese: 我曾经与女佣一起护送马图尔的女儿到她丈夫的房间。

sentences.english: Children from the ger districts cool off in the polluted Tuul River.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古包区的孩子们正在已被污染的图尔河中纳凉。

sentences.english: The top-ranked Bordeaux was Latour, which came in fifth.
sentences.chinese: 排名最靠前的波尔多是拉图尔，排在第五位。

sentences.english: And Stuart might have made the match, but Brent had not been satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 斯图尔特本来是可以匹配的，但布伦特不满意。

sentences.english: The first part introduces the background of Toulmin's model of argument.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分介绍了图尔敏论证模式产生的背景。

sentences.english: Changing of guard at Anit Kabir Mausoleum at Ataturk Monument.
sentences.chinese: 凯末尔纪念馆，阿塔图尔克雕像前的警卫交接班仪式。

sentences.english: The fourth part introduces the responses to Toulmin"s model of argument in the academic circle."
sentences.chinese: 第四部分介绍理论界对图尔敏论证模式的反应。

sentences.english: Mathur demurred at the added expense.
sentences.chinese: 马图尔反对额外的开支。

sentences.english: That makes sense to Stuart Maeshiro, since he's the one who leads his family on all their adventures.
sentences.chinese: 斯图尔特马士洛意识到，他是家人所有冒险的领导者。

sentences.english: Evans joins fellow United loanee Cameron Stewart and former Red James Chester at Hull City.
sentences.chinese: 赫尔城还有斯图尔特和切斯特在那踢球。

sentences.english: Tour says the signals can be blocked by wrapping groceries in aluminum foil.
sentences.chinese: 图尔说，用铝箔包装商品便可屏蔽这种信号。

sentences.english: Stewart opened a retail store, where she sold her home entertainment kits.
sentences.chinese: 斯图尔特开办了一家零售店，出售成套家用娱乐器材。

sentences.english: The nomadic herders of Kenya's Turkana districts have been hit particularly hard.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亚的图尔卡纳地区游牧民受到的冲击尤为严重。

sentences.english: Stuart was ill, so I went instead.
sentences.chinese: 斯图尔病了，所以换了我去。

definition: Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
Dole (name)/Bob Dole (1923-), US Republican politician, Kansas senator 1969-1996
Suleiman (name)/General Michel Suleiman (1948-), Lebanese military man and politician, president of Lebanon 2008-2014
Barth or Barthes (name)/Roland Barthes (1915-1980), French critic and semiotician
